scripts.build: npm run build.component-lib && npm run build.vite
scripts.build.component-lib: cd component-library && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build.vite: cd vite-bundle-test && npm ci --prefer-online --no-audit --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean.component-lib && npm run clean.vite
scripts.clean.component-lib: cd component-library && npm run clean && cd ../
scripts.clean.vite: cd vite-bundle-test && npm run clean && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
